item.title: Gene expression - microarray data still useful
item.description: I work on pancreatic cancer -omics. Data mining on published data is a real source of gold today when someone wants to find confirmation of an hypothesis on a more general scale than his own dataset. The most common -omics datasets out there are transcriptomics one; both RNA-Seq and good olâ€™ microarray. Regarding RNA-Seq, the well known TCGA and ICGC are my starting point for any explorative data mining analysis.
